localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
blogPost.body: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
blogPost.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.
blogPost.author: Roberto Sanabria

localize.description: Post.co是在您的团队中分享大小新闻的最佳方式。Post.co是一种简单的、低风险的分享团队更新的方式，它的设计可以替代混乱的线程和尴尬的团队邮件回复。非常适合远程团队保持联系。
localize.tagline: 最简单的方式在你的团队中发布大大小小的新闻。

localize.description: Post.co是在您的團隊中分享大小新聞的最佳方式。Post.co是一種簡單的、低風險的分享團隊更新的方式，它的設計可以替代混亂的線程和尷尬的團隊郵件回覆。非常適合遠程團隊保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的方式在你的團隊中發佈大大小小的新聞。

next.excerpt: Clubhouse Clone code built on React Native with Backend and Custom Microservices Architecture for Audio Conference which is Capable of Creating Truly Huge Rooms for Thousands of Listeners
next.title: Clubrooms - Clubhouse clone for Android and iOS

localize.description: 基于React Native构建的Clubhouse Clone代码，带有后端和自定义微服务架构的音频会议，能够为数千名听众创建真正的巨大房间。
基於React Native構建的Clubhouse Clone代碼，帶有後端和自定義微服務架構的音頻會議，能夠爲數千名聽衆創建真正的巨大房間。
